# Kolmogorov on a normal law

Try out with dummy data to check how well it works

```{r}
pval = c()

for (i in 1:1000) {
  sample_coord <- c(rnorm(10, 0, 0.1), rnorm(5, 1, 0.1))
  test = ks.test(sample_coord, "pnorm", mean = mean(sample_coord), sd = sd(sample_coord), simulate.p.value = T)
  pval = c(pval, test$p.value)
}


qqnorm(sample_coord)

hist(pval)
abline(v = median(pval), col = "red")

```

```{r}
pnorm(1)
```
